question:
You learnt about new software and planning to buy it. Write to company seeking more information about the software you want to buy. In your letter-
* Inform the seller about the exact product that you want to buy
*Introduce yourself
*Say what expectations you have from the product
text: I am Katherine, a resident of the city Chandigarh. I am writing today with regards to your new picture editing application that I recently came to know about in the Television advertisement. Moreover, as per my needs, I found it quite suitable.

Firstly, let me explain to you my requirements. I required a high pixel clarity editing application for collage making. Additionally, as per my preference, it should have  numerous filter effects  to blur the background and make the image clear and bright.

Since I am working under a Multinational company named Xenon Pharmaceuticals  Chandigarh, as a graphic designer, therefore, this type of application is mainly used in my organization as per the demand of the task. I have been searching for this product for a long time.

Furthermore, as per the advertisement, I believe that your software suits my requirement the most. While it is required for the official purpose, I expect that the delivered item should be exactly as shown on the screen. Apart from that, I think that this specification-related product will definitely increase my output for work, besides  enhancing the image of my firm.
Kindly share the quotation for the same and hope to hear an early reply.
